channel.title: Connecting Worlds on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Connecting Worlds on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A ‘Grand Unified Theory’ of Math Just Got a Little Bit Closer
item.description: By extending the scope of a key insight behind Fermat’s Last Theorem, four mathematicians have made great strides toward building a unifying theory of mathematics.
